quote.msg:
1. 冇m1/2底 core得5揀Ecof/Qfin/RMBI係咪會爛grade?

replies.msg:
1. Year 1第一個sem全部busi人已經要take maths course 學返晒calculus既野 爛唔爛grade好難講 睇你天份高唔高
2. 視乎咩major架 fina呢d熱門major要睇埋gpa
3. 應該話呢兩個major各自都好多人揀 但係有d人second major會揀d輕鬆d既 例如management,marketing
4. 呢個要問返僱主 熱門既工 即係mt個d 就唔會喇
利申 已grad

2. 視乎咩major架 fina呢d熱門major要睇埋gpa

replies.msg:
唔係 marketing management個d都唔洗interview
Acct一般啦 中規中矩 冇fina is個d咁熱門
4. 係架 咁如果佢白字黑字寫明個minimum requirement 又冇理由唔揸正黎做 況且ust勁既人都好多 大把人reach到個standard 咁點解要鬆手

quote.msg:
想問science可唔可以double major accounting? Gpa 要求大約係幾多
Eg maths + accounting

replies.msg:
唔可以
science major可以隨意2nd maj sci school既major 例如lifs, phys
其他school既2nd major選擇較少
而且收人要求較高 例如cs, rmbi, qfin, data science

想讀埋business就可以揀ddp/bibu
DDP 有29個business credits
finance/account定marketing都夠讀哂有突

quote.msg:
想問science可唔可以double major accounting? Gpa 要求大約係幾多
Eg maths + accounting

唔可以
science major可以隨意2nd maj sci school既major 例如lifs, phys
其他school既2nd major選擇較少
而且收人要求較高 例如cs, rmbi, qfin, data science

咁maec / rmbi可唔可以double major accounting?

replies.msg:
可以 只要你讀得哂
bsc既major都可以再double major bba下面既科
bba可以triple major 但由於reg科既問題好少人可以成功做到 (acct同fina係唔可以triple maj的)
bsc major例如maec rmbi就比較吃力因為major既credits數大 free electives較少
double major cs呢類較多curriculum overlap既科目就會相對輕鬆

Gpa幾多先揀得ddp?

replies.msg:
http://www.techmgmt.ust.hk/en/programs/page/49
Program requirement:
CGA: 3.25 or above
HKDSE English ≥ 5 or *LANG1002/ 1003 ≥ A- or IELTS ≥ 7.0 and no subgrade < 6.5
Pre-admission results are taken into consideration
Interview is a must for admission
* For English requirement, a P grade in LANG course will not be considered.

咁bba可唔可以double maj bsc下面嘅科

replies.msg:
bsc就應該冇可能讀得哂/declare
ddp總credit數係177-189
你搞完civil/elec degree既lab應該已經唔會想triple maj任何野

但其實冇意思
rmbi都係fina+om+cs
maec就math+econ

如果cs+bba基本已經會同rmbi/maec有唔少overlap
例如math cs econ fina等等

如果有major 入（acct)
可唔可以睇下yr1 gpa 高唔高轉其他熱門major?(ecof rmbi)
如果drop 左acct 入唔返ecof rmbi易唔易簡返？定係可以睇下gpa 幾多境再決定drop 唔drop major?

qfin rmbi maec ecof

可以double maj
只係唔可以triple maj acct/fina
因為有其他major requirement例如acct3880
你唔係1st/2nd major acct係唔會有可能reg到入去
因為triple major既唯一方法係讀哂所有requirement再同faculty self declare
變相冇可能triple major

bsc major例如maec rmbi就比較吃力因為major既credits數大 free electives較少
double major cs呢類較多curriculum overlap既科目就會相對輕鬆

但maths 唔係都係 bsc major?
唔係好明點解唔可以double major bba accounting

replies.msg: bba係sbm, 要讀哂business core+major course先當有major. 如果你first major mace想second maj acct, 你要讀哂所有business core(e.g marketing, management etc)再加acct major course. Btw, 請放低中學思想 chur讀書，尤其business，係大學冇撚用 除非你對學術特別有追求

quote.msg:
想問science可唔可以double major accounting? Gpa 要求大約係幾多
Eg maths + accounting

唔可以
science major可以隨意2nd maj sci school既major 例如lifs, phys
其他school既2nd major選擇較少
而且收人要求較高 例如cs, rmbi, qfin, data science

想讀埋business就可以揀ddp/bibu
DDP 有29個business credits
finance/account定marketing都夠讀哂有突

replies.msg:
Science school 冇人權
Ust低等生物

quote.msg: 啲人揀a&f係咪因為未揀好向咩方向發展 所以揀晒兩個大方向先？

商科相對專科就係acct > is > fina
搵工的確比較容易

如果有major 入（acct)
可唔可以睇下yr1 gpa 高唔高轉其他熱門major?(ecof rmbi)
如果drop 左acct 入唔返ecof rmbi易唔易簡返？定係可以睇下gpa 幾多境再決定drop 唔drop major?

replies.msg:
可以
但drop完就同其他bba entry一樣
唔會有advantage
drop完亦可以declare唔返
例如你acct爛左grade drop完又入唔到ecof rmbi

未步入社會工作就已經要開始批鬥 分門別類 去區分前門後門 真係值得驕傲
